        Allied Food and Confectionery Services (FCS) is the home of the best food brands in Nigeria. Our goal is to introduce Nigerians to the food they love while delivering quality, and utmost satisfaction. Allied FCS is the exclusive franchisee of BURGER KING®, the second-largest hamburger fast-food chain in the world. Allied FCS's goal is to also provide community support by creating employment opportunities for Nigerians.

Job Position: Human Resource and Admin Coordinator

Job Location: Abuja
Employment Type: Full-time
     

            
    



Roles and Responsibilities


	Execute all aspects of HR and day-to-day administrative functions within the designated locations/region.
	Manage the recruitment and selection process, including interviewing and onboarding, in collaboration with the Talent Acquisition & Management team.
	Track and monitor the attendance of the head office team within the designated locations/regions for the implementation Of compensation and benefits programs in collaboration with the Compensation & Benefits team.
	Execute and follow-up on initiatives to enhance employee engagement, morale, and overall job satisfaction within the designated locations/region.
	Coordinate the day-to-day administrative tasks and ensure efficient office operations, including office management, supplies procurement, utility payments, vendor coordination, and maintaining facility cleanliness.


Job Requirements


	Bachelor's Degree in Human Resources Management, Business Administration, or a related field.
	3-5 years of relevant HR experience of which at least 2 in a HR Generalist Role.
